page.title: 07HOGNASTON POST OFFICE
page.content: Hognaston Post Office is at the side of the main road going through Hognaton.It has a small pull-in so that drivers can park there cars off the road. From the outside it looks like a long white washed house.There is a sign to show that there is a Post Office.The Post Office is in one end of the building.Inside,the counter is separated into two sections because apart from being a Post Office it is a shop and both parts have to be kept separate.In the shop part all sorts of things are sold.There are fresh foods as well as tinned,dried and frozen ones.There are sweets,chocolates and cigarettes.There are toys,buckets, brushes,spoons and many more things. The people who use the shop are mainly local people but some passers-by do call in/especially in summer.
